meanings.definition: The process in metabolism in which complex molecules are synthesized from simpler ones.
meanings.sent1: During anabolism, cells create proteins from amino acids.
meanings.sent2: Anabolism is essential for muscle growth and repair.
meanings.sent3: The chef's culinary anabolism turned basic ingredients into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an anabolism, transforming ideas into beautiful art.
meanings.sent5: In the garden of life, anabolism is the blooming of flowers from tiny seeds.

meanings.definition: The constructive phase of metabolism in which cells build up protoplasm.
meanings.sent1: Proteins are formed during anabolism to support cell growth.
meanings.sent2: Cells rely on anabolism to maintain their structure and function.
meanings.sent3: The anabolism of Lego bricks resulted in an impressive castle construction.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as an anabolism, strengthening her resolve.
meanings.sent5: Anabolism is like a builder, assembling the building blocks of life.
